verses.verse: Then sang <S%H7891><s%> Deborah <S%H1683><s%> and Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
For that the leaders took the lead <S%H6544><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, For that the people <S%H5971><s%> offered <S%H5068><s%> themselves willingly <S%H1288><s%>, Bless ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O ye kings <S%H4428><s%>; give ear <S%H238><s%>, O ye princes <S%H7336><s%>; I <S%H7891><s%>, even I, will sing unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when thou wentest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Seir <S%H8165><s%>, When thou marchedst out <S%H6805><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, The earth <S%H776><s%> trembled <S%H7493><s%>, the heavens <S%H8064><s%> also dropped <S%H5197><s%>, Yea <S%H5645><s%>, the clouds dropped <S%H5197><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>.

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> quaked <S%H5140><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Even yon Sinai <S%H5514><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

In the days <S%H3117><s%> of Shamgar <S%H8044><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Anath <S%H6067><s%>, In the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jael <S%H3278><s%>, the highways <S%H734><s%> were unoccupied <S%H2308><s%>, And the travellers <S%H1980><s%> walked <S%H3212><s%> through byways <S%H6128><s%>.

The rulers <S%H6520><s%> ceased <S%H2308><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, they ceased <S%H2308><s%>, Until that I Deborah <S%H1683><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, That I arose <S%H6965><s%> a mother <S%H517><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

They chose <S%H977><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>; Then was war <S%H3901><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%>: Was there a shield <S%H4043><s%> or spear <S%H7420><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> Among forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

My heart <S%H3820><s%> is toward the governors <S%H2710><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, That offered themselves willingly <S%H5068><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>: Bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Tell <S%H7878><s%> of it <S%H7392><s%>, ye that ride on white <S%H6715><s%> asses <S%H860><s%>, Ye that sit <S%H3427><s%> on rich carpets <S%H4055><s%>, And ye that walk <S%H1980><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>.

Far from the noise <S%H6963><s%> of archers <S%H2686><s%>, in the places of drawing water <S%H4857><s%>, There shall they rehearse <S%H8567><s%> the righteous acts <S%H6666><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Even the righteous acts <S%H6666><s%> of his rule <S%H6520><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>. Then the people <S%H5971><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to the gates <S%H8179><s%>.

Awake <S%H5782><s%>, awake <S%H5782><s%>, Deborah <S%H1683><s%>; Awake <S%H5782><s%>, awake <S%H5782><s%>, utter <S%H1696><s%> a song <S%H7892><s%>: Arise <S%H6965><s%>, Barak <S%H1301><s%>, and lead away thy <S%H7628><s%> captives <S%H7617><s%>, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%>.
Then came down a remnant <S%H8300><s%> of the nobles <S%H117><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%>; Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came down for me against <S%H7287><s%> the mighty <S%H1368><s%>.

Out of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> came down they whose root <S%H8328><s%> is in Amalek <S%H6002><s%>; After <S%H310><s%> thee <S%H1144><s%>, Benjamin, among thy peoples <S%H5971><s%>; Out of Machir <S%H4353><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> governors <S%H2710><s%>, And out of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> they that handle <S%H4900><s%> the marshal <S%H5608><s%>'s staff <S%H7626><s%>.

And the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> were with Deborah <S%H1683><s%>; As was Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, so was Barak <S%H1301><s%>; Into the valley <S%H6010><s%> they rushed <S%H7971><s%> forth at his feet <S%H7272><s%>. By the watercourses <S%H6390><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> There were great <S%H1419><s%> resolves <S%H2711><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>.

Why sattest <S%H3427><s%> thou among <S%H996><s%> the sheepfolds <S%H4942><s%>, To hear <S%H8085><s%> the pipings <S%H8292><s%> for the flocks <S%H5739><s%>? At the watercourses <S%H6390><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> There were great <S%H1419><s%> searchings <S%H2714><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>.

Gilead <S%H1568><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: And Dan <S%H1835><s%>, why did he remain <S%H1481><s%> in ships <S%H591><s%>? Asher <S%H836><s%> sat still <S%H3427><s%> at the haven <S%H2348><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, And abode <S%H7931><s%> by his creeks <S%H4664><s%>.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> was a people <S%H5971><s%> that jeoparded <S%H2778><s%> their lives <S%H5315><s%> unto the death <S%H4191><s%>, And Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, upon the high places <S%H4791><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>.

The kings <S%H4428><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%>; Then fought <S%H3898><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>. In Taanach <S%H8590><s%> by the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%>: They took <S%H3947><s%> no gain <S%H1215><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%>.
From heaven <S%H8064><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%>, From their courses <S%H4546><s%> they fought <S%H3898><s%> against Sisera <S%H5516><s%>.

The river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%> swept them away <S%H1640><s%>, That ancient <S%H6917><s%> river <S%H5158><s%>, the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%>. O my soul <S%H5315><s%>, march on <S%H1869><s%> with strength <S%H5797><s%>.
Then did the horsehoofs <S%H6119><s%> stamp <S%H1986><s%> By reason of the prancings <S%H1726><s%>, the prancings <S%H1726><s%> of their strong ones <S%H47><s%>.

Curse <S%H779><s%> ye Meroz <S%H4789><s%>, said <S%H559><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>. Curse <S%H779><s%> ye bitterly <S%H779><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof <S%H935><s%>, Because they came not to the help <S%H5833><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, To the help <S%H5833><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> against the mighty <S%H1368><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> above women <S%H802><s%> shall Jael <S%H3278><s%> be <S%H802><s%>, The wife of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>; Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall she be above women <S%H802><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%>.
He asked <S%H7592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, and she gave <S%H5414><s%> him milk <S%H2461><s%>; She brought him <S%H7126><s%> butter <S%H2529><s%> in a lordly <S%H117><s%> dish <S%H5602><s%>.

She put <S%H7971><s%> her hand <S%H3027><s%> to the tent-pin <S%H3489><s%>, And her right hand <S%H3225><s%> to the workmen <S%H6001><s%>'s hammer <S%H1989><s%>; And with the hammer she smote <S%H1986><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, she smote through <S%H4277><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%>; Yea <S%H4272><s%>, she pierced and struck through <S%H2498><s%> his temples <S%H7541><s%>.

At her feet <S%H7272><s%> he bowed <S%H3766><s%>, he fell <S%H5307><s%>, he lay <S%H7901><s%>; At her feet <S%H7272><s%> he bowed <S%H3766><s%>, he fell <S%H5307><s%>; Where <S%H834><s%> he bowed <S%H3766><s%>, there he fell down <S%H5307><s%> dead <S%H7703><s%>.

Through the window <S%H2474><s%> she looked <S%H8259><s%> forth <S%H2980><s%>, and cried, The mother <S%H517><s%> of Sisera cried <S%H2980><s%> through the lattice <S%H822><s%>, Why is his chariot <S%H7393><s%> so long <S%H954><s%> in coming <S%H935><s%>? Why tarry <S%H309><s%> the wheels <S%H6471><s%> of his chariots <S%H4818><s%>?
Her wise <S%H2450><s%> ladies <S%H8282><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> her <S%H7725><s%>, Yea, she returned answer to herself <S%H561><s%>,

Have they not found <S%H4672><s%>, have they not divided <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>? A damsel <S%H7356><s%>, two <S%H7361><s%> damsels to every <S%H7218><s%> man <S%H1397><s%>; To Sisera <S%H5516><s%> a spoil <S%H7998><s%> of dyed <S%H6648><s%> garments <S%H7998><s%>, A spoil of dyed <S%H6648><s%> garments embroidered <S%H7553><s%>, Of dyed <S%H6648><s%> garments embroidered on both sides <S%H7553><s%>, on the necks <S%H6677><s%> of the spoil <S%H7998><s%>?

So let all thine enemies <S%H341><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: But let them that love <S%H157><s%> him be as the sun <S%H8121><s%> when he goeth forth <S%H3318><s%> in his might <S%H1369><s%>. And the land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
